ch.ethz.inf.vs.wot.autowot.project.resources
Class AbstractResourceItem

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.inf.vs.wot.autowot.project.resources.AbstractResourceItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeleterItem, GetterItem, PosterItem, PutterItem, ResourceItem
public abstract class AbstractResourceItem
extends java.lang.Object

Implementation of an abstract Resource Item, this is the base class for ResourceItem, GetterItem, PosterItem and PutterItem

Author:
Simon Mayer, simon.mayer@inf.ethz.ch, ETH Zurich, Claude Barthels, cbarthels@student.ethz.ch, ETH Zurich
